name: Entrepreneur First
tag_list: accelerator, graduate, high-growth, tech, training, mentorship, networking
overview:
Entrepreneur First is a new route into entrepreneurship for graduates, backed by some of the UKâ€™s leading entrepreneurs, student groups, and prestigious international firms. EF selects top talent from across the nation and help them launch tech companies with huge growth potential - it’s a scheme for young men and women with the ambition and ability to build something big, bad, and bold.

The programme will help you by providing:

  • A community of highly talented, driven graduates who share your dream and want a co-founder
  • Mentorship and training from successful entrepreneurs
  • Networking with leading entrepreneurs, investors and corporate business leaders
  • Access to funding via our network of investors
  • In-kind support, including workspace, free legal advice, software and other benefits

Entrepreneur First is a non-for-profit and is proudly sponsored by McKinsey & Company, Microsoft, Silicon Valley Bank, Experian, and City of London. Thanks is also due to our in-kind sponsors BNP Paribas, Enternships, Octopus, Osborne Clarke, Nesta and Cambridge IP, as well as our supporters, Google and Facebook.

If you feel like EF might be right for you, go onto www.entrepreneurfirst.org.uk to find out more and apply now.
